title: Did not give me Mastery 6 shard
body: I was mastery 4 with yasuo and i got a S- and ranked up to mastery 5. For a moment it said i got a mastery 6 shard and then it auto closed. i didnt see a shard in my hextech crafting, did i get one but its not showing up? or did it just glitch?

replies.body:
It's not possible to go from level 4 to level 5 champion mastery and earn a champion token in the same match. The message that pops up lets you know that you're *now eligible* to earn Level 6 Mastery Tokens from that point on. For complete deets, check out our [Champion Mastery Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide). 

Let me know if you have any questions.
i just got mastery 6 with Yasuo yesterday thank you again for helping me!
